wordpressPage.title: Halloween
wordpressPage.content:
Have a look at this tweet

1 – What do you think of the tweet?

2 – What are the origins of Halloween and does the holiday still reflect those origins e.g. Are people still frightened, or do they just see it as a bit of fun?

3 – What do Christians think of Halloween?

Suggested bible passage: Philippians 4:8

4 – Does Halloween reflect this verse?

5 – Do you think it’s okay for Christians to take part in Halloween activities?

(This discussion starter was written by Beth Cooper)
